# File lib/innate/cache.rb, line 76
    def initialize(name, klass = nil)
      @name = name.to_s.dup.freeze

      klass ||= options[@name.to_sym]
      @instance = klass.new

      @instance.cache_setup(
        ENV['HOSTNAME'],
        ENV['USER'],
        'pristine',
        @name
      )
    end
